title: Need 11 rp rito!
body: first time doing plz tell me that my art is successful gg

replies.body: Wait, if you make artwork they give you free RP???
yes. if your 40RP or under short of buying something, you make art work send support ticket then profit!

sent it into player support and they can get you sorted.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Damn, i didn't know you could do that. I would of asked them to take away the 1rp i had left a long time ago :D
Rito hire this man for the art department
I tried asking for 55 rp but nope (I was short 55Rp short, of buying a 975 rp  {{champion:58}} skin)
buy a $50 RP card and I am sure they will give you some.
